thread.title: Jack Butland gives Stoke fans a huge boost after declaring himself fully fit as he looks back on night he injured himself with England against Germany
thread.title_full: Jack Butland gives Stoke fans a huge boost after declaring himself fully fit as he looks back on night he injured himself with England against Germany

author: gboulton
title: Jack Butland gives Stoke fans a huge boost after declaring himself fully fit as he looks back on night he injured himself with England against Germany
text:
EFL a year to the day Jack Butland gives Stoke fans a huge boost after declaring himself fully fit as he looks back on night he injured himself with England against Germany 
Goalkeeper has been out for a year after fracturing his ankle as the Three Lions beat Germany 3-2 By George Boulton 26th March 2017, 5:21 pm Updated: 26th March 2017, 5:23 pm
